channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lizard , The Woodsman/The Trapper , The Time Jumper/The Time Warper , The Assistant/The Accountant
channel.description:
> # [color=gray]The Lizard[/color] > **[color=gray]Neutral Social[/color]** > > **Passive (Colourful Skin)** - All abilities against you will be prevented. > **Passive (Anti-Social)** - You muse use an ability every night in order to stay alive. > > **Day Ability (Force)** - Make a player accuse another player of treason.(1 Use) > > **Night Ability (Morph)** - Share a player's fate tonight(Frame/MindWarp/Attacks/Heals etc).(Infinite Uses - Can NOT target The King) > **Night Ability (Iron Skin)** - Make a player Immune to Death.(1 Use - Can NOT target The King) > **Goal:** *Survive until the end of the game.*
> # [color=steblue]The Woodsman[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Killer[/color]** > > **Passive (Trapped)** - Anyone visiting you will be marked with **Caught**(See **Caught** for more information) > > **Day Ability (Expertise)** - Anyone voting you will be marked with **Caught**.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Special Delivery)** - "Trap" a player's room. If that player has left their room , they will be occupied and die.(Infinite Uses - Only Usable Every Other Night ~ Does NOT Bypass Occupy Immunity) > **Night Ability (Crafter)** - Anyone visiting you tonight will die.(2 Uses - Does NOT give you **Conversion Immunity** or **Death Immunity**) >**Goal:** *Defeat [color=purple]The Unseen[/color]/[color=darkred]The Cult[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.* > > **[color=purple]Converts[/color] into:** > > # [color=purple]The Trapper[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Little Friends)** - Anyone visiting **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** will be marked with **Caught**(See **Caught** for more information) > > **Day Ability (Fake Trap)** - You will appear not suspicious tonight.(1 Use) > **Day Ability (Intimidate)** - Anyone visiting you will be marked with **Caught**.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Deadly Traps)** - Empower one of you **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** members.(2 Uses - **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** can not be Occupied/Redirected , **[color=purple]The Mastermind[/color]**'s next conversion is guaranteed ~ Bypasess **Clear Mind** etc. , **[color=purple]The Bomber[/color]**'s visitors will die.) > **Night Ability (Secret Trap)** - "Trap" a player's room. If they visit **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** tonight , they will die.(3 Uses - Can NOT target The King) >**Goal:** *Defeat [color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.*
> # [color=steblue]The Time Jumper[/color] :shield: > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Change the Timeline)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. > **Passive (Another Time)** - Immune to Detection.(Observer visit etc) > > **Night Ability (Delay Death)** - Select a player and delay abilities used on them by 1,2 or 3 nights.(Infinite Uses - Can NOT Target The King and Can NOT target the same player twice in a game) > **Night Ability (Too Late)** - Become Immune to Death tonight.(1 Use) > **Goal:** *Defeat [color=purple]The Unseen[/color]/[color=darkred]The Cult[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.* > > **[color=purple]Converts[/color] into:** > > # [color=purple]The Time Warper[/color] :shield: > **[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Change the Timeline)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. > **Passive (Another Time)** - Immune to Detection.(Observer visit etc) > > **Night Ability (Clock Master)** - All abilities against **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** will be delayed by 2 Nights.(1 Use) > **Night Ability (Fast-Forward)** - All Investigative results will be shown as the results the night before.(3 Uses) >**Goal:** *Defeat [color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.*
> # [color=steblue]The Assistant[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]** > > **Passive (Known Presence)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. > > **Day Ability (Companion)** - Go into a player's room tonight.(Infinite Uses - You will get the Feedback from their abilities , except **Conversion** and **Attacks**. If you target dies , you will die as well. All visits against you , except **Attacks** , will be prevented.) > > **Night Ability (Reach Out)** - See if a player is a Social class.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Conclusion)** - You and your **Companion**'s target will be able to whisper without anyone seeing your whispers.(2 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat [color=purple]The Unseen[/color]/[color=darkred]The Cult[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.* > > **[color=purple]Converts[/color] into:** > > # [color=purple]The Accountant[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Social[/color]** > > **Passive (Known Presence)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. > > **Day Ability (Companion)** - Go into a player's room tonight.They will receive incorrect feedback from their abilities.(Infinite Uses - You will get the Feedback from their abilities , except **Conversion** and **Attacks**. If you target dies , you will die as well. All visits against you , except **Attacks** , will be prevented.) > **Day Ability (Framer)** - Frame and receive the feedback from abilities used on your target.(Infinite Uses - Can NOT target The King) > > **Night Ability (An Eye for An Eye)** - See if a player is an Investigative class.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Blindness)** - **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** will be able to whisper hiddenly. You and your **Companion**'s target will be able to whisper without anyone seeing your whispers.(2 Uses) >**Goal:** *Defeat [color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.*
> # "Caught" Marks (for [color=steblue]The Woodsman[/color]/[color=purple]The Trapper[/color]) >> **Expertise:** People(marked with **Caught**) visiting **[color=steblue]The Woodsman[/color]** will be prevented from using their abilities the next night.(Example : You visit **[color=steblue]The Woodsman[/color]** when he uses **Expertise**. You will be prevented from using your abilities the next night IF you are marked. - Only works once) > >> **Special Delivery:** People(marked with **Caught**) visiting **[color=steblue]The Woodsman[/color]** will get occupied and will not die.(Only works once) > >> **Demolition:** People(marked with **Caught**) that have a passive will become Immune to Conversion. If an **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** member(that is marked with **Caught**) visits you , you will become Immune to Conversion the next night. > >> **Fake Trap:** Investigative classes(marked with **Caught**) will die when they visit **[color=purple]The Trapper[/color]**. > >> **Intimidate:** No effects. > >> **Deadly Trap:** No effects. > >> **Secret Trap:** If the target is killed by **Secret Trap** , anyone visiting them will die as well.
I tried my hard. Hope you like 'em!

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Lizard , The Woodsman/The Trapper , The Time Jumper/The Time Warper , The Assistant/The Accountant
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Lizard

Neutral Social

Passive (Colourful Skin) - All abilities against you will be prevented.
Passive (Anti-Social) - You muse use an ability every night in order to stay alive.

Day Ability (Force) - Make a player accuse another player of treason.(1 Use)

Night Ability (Morph) - Share a player’s fate tonight(Frame/MindWarp/Attacks/Heals etc).(Infinite Uses - Can NOT target The King)
Night Ability (Iron Skin) - Make a player Immune to Death.(1 Use - Can NOT target The King)
Goal: Survive until the end of the game.

The Woodsman

Blue Dragon Killer

Passive (Trapped) - Anyone visiting you will be marked with Caught(See Caught for more information)

Day Ability (Expertise) - Anyone voting you will be marked with Caught.(2 Uses)

Night Ability (Special Delivery) - “Trap” a player’s room. If that player has left their room , they will be occupied and die.(Infinite Uses - Only Usable Every Other Night ~ Does NOT Bypass Occupy Immunity)
Night Ability (Crafter) - Anyone visiting you tonight will die.(2 Uses - Does NOT give you Conversion Immunity or Death Immunity)
Goal: Defeat The Unseen/The Cult and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into:

The Trapper

Unseen Support

Passive (Little Friends) - Anyone visiting The Unseen will be marked with Caught(See Caught for more information)

Day Ability (Fake Trap) - You will appear not suspicious tonight.(1 Use)
Day Ability (Intimidate) - Anyone visiting you will be marked with Caught.(2 Uses)

Night Ability (Deadly Traps) - Empower one of you Unseen members.(2 Uses - The Assassin can not be Occupied/Redirected , The Mastermind’s next conversion is guaranteed ~ Bypasess Clear Mind etc. , The Bomber’s visitors will die.)
Night Ability (Secret Trap) - “Trap” a player’s room. If they visit The Unseen tonight , they will die.(3 Uses - Can NOT target The King)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Time Jumper

Blue Dragon Support

Passive (Change the Timeline) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.
Passive (Another Time) - Immune to Detection.(Observer visit etc)

Night Ability (Delay Death) - Select a player and delay abilities used on them by 1,2 or 3 nights.(Infinite Uses - Can NOT Target The King and Can NOT target the same player twice in a game)
Night Ability (Too Late) - Become Immune to Death tonight.(1 Use)
Goal: Defeat The Unseen/The Cult and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into:

The Time Warper

Unseen Support

Passive (Change the Timeline) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.
Passive (Another Time) - Immune to Detection.(Observer visit etc)

Night Ability (Clock Master) - All abilities against The Assassin will be delayed by 2 Nights.(1 Use)
Night Ability (Fast-Forward) - All Investigative results will be shown as the results the night before.(3 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Assistant

Blue Dragon Social

Passive (Known Presence) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.

Day Ability (Companion) - Go into a player’s room tonight.(Infinite Uses - You will get the Feedback from their abilities , except Conversion and Attacks. If you target dies , you will die as well. All visits against you , except Attacks , will be prevented.)

Night Ability (Reach Out) - See if a player is a Social class.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Conclusion) - You and your Companion’s target will be able to whisper without anyone seeing your whispers.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Unseen/The Cult and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into:

The Accountant

Unseen Social

Passive (Known Presence) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.

Day Ability (Companion) - Go into a player’s room tonight.They will receive incorrect feedback from their abilities.(Infinite Uses - You will get the Feedback from their abilities , except Conversion and Attacks. If you target dies , you will die as well. All visits against you , except Attacks , will be prevented.)
Day Ability (Framer) - Frame and receive the feedback from abilities used on your target.(Infinite Uses - Can NOT target The King)

Night Ability (An Eye for An Eye) - See if a player is an Investigative class.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Blindness) - The Unseen will be able to whisper hiddenly. You and your Companion’s target will be able to whisper without anyone seeing your whispers.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

“Caught” Marks (for The Woodsman/The Trapper)

Expertise: People(marked with Caught) visiting The Woodsman will be prevented from using their abilities the next night.(Example : You visit The Woodsman when he uses Expertise. You will be prevented from using your abilities the next night IF you are marked. - Only works once)

Special Delivery: People(marked with Caught) visiting The Woodsman will get occupied and will not die.(Only works once)

Demolition: People(marked with Caught) that have a passive will become Immune to Conversion. If an Unseen member(that is marked with Caught) visits you , you will become Immune to Conversion the next night.

Fake Trap: Investigative classes(marked with Caught) will die when they visit The Trapper.

Intimidate: No effects.

Deadly Trap: No effects.

Secret Trap: If the target is killed by Secret Trap , anyone visiting them will die as well.

I tried my hard. Hope you like 'em!

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Lizard , The Woodsman/The Trapper , The Time Jumper/The Time Warper , The Assistant/The Accountant
